content:
User: Scope Mismatch: It knows there should be 14 interactions (based on your input) but can’t find them in the current context, so it’s looping helplessly trying to access the attachment.

Grok: Tagging Intent: DeepSearch understands the task—splitting the transcript into [JESSE PROMPT] and [GROK RESPONSE] sections and applying tags like #STRATEGIC or #INSIGHT_WIN—but it can’t execute without the full text.
